1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible in the center of the image, slightly to the right. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered.

2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible and centered in the image. The drone should move straight to get closer to the target.

4.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears extremely close with clear texture and depth detail. No further movement is necessary.
